createNewAccountWithEmail.default: Create a new account with email

emailWhenSomeoneLikes.default: Email when someone likes my comment

emailWhenSomeoneReplies.default: Email when someone replies to me

emailCommentsIFollow.default: Email comments in conversations I follow

emailSenttoResetPassword.default: Email sent! Check your inbox for a link to reset your password

forgotYourPasswordInstructions.default: Enter your username or email address below, and we'll send you a link to change your password.

labelConfirmNewPassword.description: Label displayed above the confirm password input on the reset password view

labelNewPassword.description: Label displayed above the new password input on the reset password view

passwordLinkExpired.default: The link you clicked to reset your password has expired. Reset your password again, and we'll send you a new link.

pleaseCheckEmailToComplete.default: Please check your email to complete your registration.

successPasswordChanged.default: Success! Your password has been changed, and you are now logged in

termsAndConditionsIntro.default: By signing up, you accept the

termsOfUseIntro.default: By logging in, you agree to

avatarImageExceedSize.default: Your avatar image has exceeded the 2mb file limit

fieldonlyacceptsavalidemail.default: Field only accepts a valid email

filesizemustbelessthanMB.default: File size must be less than {#}MB

passwordLength.description: Password required length error message shown in password popover

passwordCharacters.default: include both lower and upper case characters.
passwordCharacters.description: Password required characters error message shown in password popover

passwordSymbols.default: include at least one number and one symbol.
passwordSymbols.description: Password required special characters error message shown in password popover

passwordUsername.description: Password username error message shown in password popover

passwordErrorContainsFirstName.default:
The password you entered contains either your username, first name or last name. For security reasons, please enter a password that does not contain your username, first name or last name.

Please also remember that your password needs to contain:
6 to 32 characters
An uppercase character
A lowercase character
A symbol
passwordErrorContainsFirstName.description: Error message shown on the reset password flow if the user's password contains their first name

passwordErrorContainsLastName.default:
The password you entered contains either your username, first name or last name. For security reasons, please enter a password that does not contain your username, first name or last name.

Please also remember that your password needs to contain:
6 to 32 characters
An uppercase character
A lowercase character
A symbol
passwordErrorContainsLastName.description: Error message shown on the reset password flow if the user's password contains their last name

passwordErrorContainsUsername.default:
The password you entered contains either your username, first name or last name. For security reasons, please enter a password that does not contain your username, first name or last name.

Please also remember that your password needs to contain:
6 to 32 characters
An uppercase character
A lowercase character
A symbol
passwordErrorContainsUsername.description: Error message shown on the reset password flow if the user's password contains their username

passwordErrorTooShort.description: Error message shown on the reset password flow if the user's password is shorter than 6 characters

passwordErrorTooLong.description: Error message shown on the reset password flow if the user's password is longer than 6 characters

passwordErrorMissingUppercase.default: Password should contain at least one uppercase character
passwordErrorMissingUppercase.description: Error message shown on the reset password flow if the user's password doesn't contain at least 1 uppercase character

passwordErrorMissingLowercase.default: Password should contain at least one lowercase character
passwordErrorMissingLowercase.description: Error message shown on the reset password flow if the user's password doesn't contain at least 1 lowercase character

passwordErrorMissingSymbol.default: Password should contain at least one symbol in the set !@#$%^&*()?.,<>';:"[]{}|
passwordErrorMissingSymbol.description: Error message shown on the reset password flow if the user's password doesn't contain at least 1 symbol in the set !@#$%^&*()?.,<>';:"[]{}|
